summary: Build a web app version matching v46: customer view + upload section, admin-only authentication, admin can lock/unlock apps to prevent user comment generation, admin can download all uploaded images in one click, plus improved UI colors/graphics and performance/bug fixes.
architectural_notes: Locking an app disables user comment generation for that app until unlocked by admin.
Public users require no authentication; only admin area is authenticated.
known_issues: Graphics/UI issues reported; requires visual cleanup.

existing_features.title: Restore a public (no PIN/no authentication) end-user experience with both a Customer View section and an Upload Section section available without admin unlock, matching the v46 structure as closely as possible.
Update the app shell/navigation so users can switch between Customer View, Upload Section, and Admin Panel; only Admin Panel must be protected by the existing admin PIN unlock flow.
Implement an admin-controlled lock/unlock state per existing “app” (treat as comment list IDs) so that when a list is locked, end users cannot generate comments from that list until it is unlocked.
Update Customer View and Upload Section UIs to reflect locked lists: indicate lock status in list selection UI and disable/guard generate actions for locked lists with an English explanation.
Add an Admin Panel action to download all uploaded rating images in one click.
Improve perceived performance and fix slowness/lag in the UI, focusing on reducing unnecessary re-renders and expensive visual effects while keeping the interface visually appealing.
Improve the overall UI colors/graphics with a coherent visual theme applied consistently across Customer View, Upload Section, and Admin Panel (English UI text).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove authentication/pin for non-admin users; admin panel remains protected
Admin can lock/unlock existing apps; when locked, users cannot generate comments until unlocked
Admin panel: one-click download of all uploaded images
Improve website performance (site sometimes runs late/slow)

projectName: Restore public Customer View + Upload Section, keep admin-only unlock, add app lock/unlock + bulk image download, and improve UI/performance
